mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BALANCE ( COMPANY_MGMTNO, USER_MGMTSEQ, SALE_STR_DATE, SALE_END_DATE, SALE_COMMISSION, CP_COMMISSION, OWNER_PROFIT, TOTAL_SALE_COUNT, TOTAL_SALE_PRICE, SALE_TYPE, CONTRACT_TYPE, MOD_DT, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{company_mgmtno}, #{user_mgmtseq}, #{sale_str_date}, #{sale_end_date}, #{total_sale_company_commission}, #{total_cp_commission}, #{total_profit}, #{total_sale_count}, #{total_sale_price}, #{sale_type}, #{contract_type}, NOW(), NOW() )

INSERT INTO BALANCE_DETAIL ( BALANCE_MGMTNO, CONTENTS_CD, SALE_COUNT, SALE_PRICE, CP_PROFIT, SALE_PROFIT, MOD_DT, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{balance_mgmtno}, #{contents_cd}, #{sale_count}, #{contentsSalePrice}, #{contentsCpProfit}, #{contentsSaleProfit}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT /* Balance.cpList */ DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE,'%Y-%m') as SALE_STR_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE,'%Y-%m') as SALE_END_DATE ,SUM(BALD.SALE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE ,SUM(BALD.CP_PROFIT) AS CP_COMMISSION ,COM.COMPANY_NAME ,(SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = CONTR.CONTRACT_TYPE) AS CONTRACT_TYPE ,BAL.REG_DT FROM BALANCE_DETAIL BALD, BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM, CONTENTS CON, CONTRACT CONTR WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND CON.CONTENTS_CD = BALD.CONTENTS_CD AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = CON.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND CONTR.COMPANY_MGMTNO = COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE = 'CP' AND BAL.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND COM.COMPANY_NAME like '%${searchQuery}%'
AND BAL.REG_DT BETWEEN #{searchStrDate} AND #{searchEndDate}
GROUP BY COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO
ORDER BY BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO
ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY BAL.OWNER_PROFIT DESC
ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT DESC
LIMIT #{ startRownum }, #{ perPage }

SELECT /* Balance.cpsCount */ COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT /* Balance.cpList */ DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE,'%Y-%m') as SALE_STR_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE,'%Y-%m') as SALE_END_DATE ,SUM(BALD.SALE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE ,SUM(BALD.CP_PROFIT) AS CP_COMMISSION ,COM.COMPANY_NAME ,(SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = CONTR.CONTRACT_TYPE) AS CONTRACT_TYPE ,BAL.REG_DT FROM BALANCE_DETAIL BALD, BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM, CONTENTS CON, CONTRACT CONTR WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND CON.CONTENTS_CD = BALD.CONTENTS_CD AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = CON.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND CONTR.COMPANY_MGMTNO = COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE = 'CP' AND BAL.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND COM.COMPANY_NAME like '%${searchQuery}%'
AND BAL.REG_DT BETWEEN #{searchStrDate} AND #{searchEndDate}
GROUP BY COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO ) A

SELECT /* Balance.saleList */ (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = BAL.SALE_TYPE) AS SALE_TYPE, (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = BAL.CONTRACT_TYPE) AS CONTRACT_TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS SALE_STR_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS SALE_END_DATE, BAL.SALE_COMMISSION, BAL.CP_COMMISSION, BAL.OWNER_PROFIT, BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT, BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE, COM.COMPANY_NAME, CONCAT(CONT.NAME, ' 외 ', count(CONT.NAME)-1) AS contents_name FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM, BALANCE_DETAIL BD, CONTENTS CONT WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND CONT.CONTENTS_CD = BD.CONTENTS_CD AND BAL.DEL_YN = 'N' AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE = 'SC'
AND ( COM.COMPANY_NAME like '%${searchQuery}%' OR CONT.NAME like '%${searchQuery}%' )
AND BAL.REG_DT BETWEEN #{searchStrDate} AND #{searchEndDate}
GROUP BY COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO
ORDER BY BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO
ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY BAL.OWNER_PROFIT DESC
ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT DESC
LIMIT #{ startRownum }, #{ perPage }

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT /* Balance.salesCount */ (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = BAL.SALE_TYPE) AS SALE_TYPE, (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = BAL.CONTRACT_TYPE) AS CONTRACT_TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS SALE_STR_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS SALE_END_DATE, BAL.SALE_COMMISSION, BAL.CP_COMMISSION, BAL.OWNER_PROFIT, BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT, BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE, COM.COMPANY_NAME, CONCAT(CONT.NAME, ' 외 ', count(CONT.NAME)-1) AS contents_name FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM, BALANCE_DETAIL BD, CONTENTS CONT WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND CONT.CONTENTS_CD = BD.CONTENTS_CD AND BAL.DEL_YN = 'N' AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE = 'SC'
AND ( COM.COMPANY_NAME like '%${searchQuery}%' OR CONT.NAME like '%${searchQuery}%' )
AND BAL.REG_DT BETWEEN #{searchStrDate} AND #{searchEndDate}
GROUP BY BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO ) A

SELECT /* Balance.saleCompanyList */ COM.COMPANY_NAME as company_name, COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO as company_mgmtno FROM COMPANY COM, CONTRACT CONT WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = CONT.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE = 'SC'

SELECT /* Balance.device */ CTD.SALE_TYPE as sale_type, (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = CTD.SALE_TYPE) AS sale_type_name FROM COMPANY COM, CONTRACT CONT, CONTRACT_DETAIL CTD WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = CONT.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND CONT.CONTRACT_MGMTNO = CTD.CONTRACT_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE = 'SC' AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = #{company_mgmtno} GROUP BY CTD.SALE_TYPE

SELECT /* Balance.saleType */ CONT.CONTRACT_TYPE as contract_type, (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = CONT.CONTRACT_TYPE) AS contract_type_name FROM COMPANY COM, CONTRACT CONT WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = CONT.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE = 'SC' AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = #{company_mgmtno} GROUP BY CONT.CONTRACT_TYPE

SELECT CCGR.CONTENTS_CD as contents_cd, CON.NAME as name, CCGR.SALE_PRICE as sale_price, ( SELECT SALE_PROFIT_RATE FROM CONTRACT WHERE COMPANY_MGMTNO=CON.COMPANY_MGMTNO LIMIT 1 ) AS cp_rate, CNTR.SALE_PROFIT_RATE AS sale_company_rate, (SELECT COMPANY_NAME FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_MGMTNO = CON.COMPANY_MGMTNO) AS cp_name
FROM COMPANY COM, CONTRACT CNTR, CONTENTS CON, CONTRACT_CONTENTS_GROUP CCGR WHERE 1=1 AND CNTR.CONTRACT_MGMTNO = CCGR.CONTRACT_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = CNTR.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND CON.CONTENTS_CD = CCGR.CONTENTS_CD AND CNTR.COMPANY_MGMTNO = #{company_mgmtno}
AND CON.NAME like '%${searchQuery}%'
GROUP BY CCGR.CONTENTS_CD
mapper.update: UPDATE BALANCE SET SALE_STR_DATE = #{sale_str_date}, SALE_END_DATE= #{sale_end_date}, SALE_COMMISSION= #{sale_commission}, CP_COMMISSION= #{cp_commission}, OWNER_PROFIT= #{owner_profit}, TOTAL_SALE_COUNT= #{total_sale_count}, TOTAL_SALE_PRICE= #{total_sale_price}, MOD_DT= NOW() WHERE BALANCE_MGMTNO = #{balance_mgmtno}
UPDATE BALANCE SET DEL_YN = 'Y', MOD_DT= NOW() WHERE BALANCE_MGMTNO = #{balance_mgmtno}
